flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: I built this project when i was in the 6th grade, for a competition at the IIT techfest in jan 2010. The IIT techfest is a competition for engineering students.However, my love towards making this brought me into making this project.I am now in the 8th grade!
guide.introduction_rendered: I built this project when i was in the 6th grade, for a competition at the IIT techfest in jan 2010. The IIT techfest is a competition for engineering students.However, my love towards making this brought me into making this project.I am now in the 8th grade!
guide.summary: This project will go about making a DIY solar powered boat prototye. However due to a few problems on our main PC, we were unable to give the circuit diagram for the same.We will soon supply the diagram.
guide.title: DIY SOLAR POWERED OAT PROTOTYPE
